snippet.title: Syndicate Intro
snippet.description:
Introduction sequence from the PC classic, Syndicate. While it might look a little dated by modern standards, it's still enjoyable to see how the agents are "recruited" to the corporation and brainwashed.

Sadly, you can't knock people out by running them over in the game, you just plow them down and kill 'em :(
